Uses of Class
thing.Thing

  • Packages that use Thing 
    Package Description
    actor
    Classes used to create the actors in the simulation (e.g., Person).
    place
    Classes used to create the places in the simulation (e.g., Room).
    thing
    Classes used to create things in the simulation (e.g., Thing).
    world
    Classes used to create and report on worlds in the simulation (e.g., World, Reporter).

    • Uses of Thing in actor

      Methods in actor that return Thing 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Thing Robot.drop(Thing t) 
      Thing Actor.drop(Thing t)
      Remove item from inventory of person and add it to room inventory.
      Methods in actor that return types with arguments of type Thing 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<Thing> Actor.inventory()
      Inventory of person suitable for iteration by clients.
      Methods in actor with parameters of type Thing 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Thing Robot.drop(Thing t) 
      Thing Actor.drop(Thing t)
      Remove item from inventory of person and add it to room inventory.
      void Robot.take(Thing t) 
      void Actor.take(Thing t)
      Add an item to inventory of a person.

    • Uses of Thing in place

      Methods in place that return types with arguments of type Thing 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<Thing> Place.contents()
      Contents of place.
      Methods in place with parameters of type Thing 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Place.addThing(Thing t)
      Add something to the room's content.

    • Uses of Thing in thing

      Subclasses of Thing in thing 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Computer
      Models computers in worlds.
      class  Food
      Models Food in worlds.
      class  Plant
      Models plants in worlds.

    • Uses of Thing in world

      Methods in world that return types with arguments of type Thing 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<Thing> World.items()
      Items (things) in the world in a (possibly) empty collection of an appropriate class (e.g., ArrayList).
